column1: '''Bradford Lee Eden''' (born [[1960]]) has a Ph.D. in Medieval Musicology
column2: and currently serves as Dean of Library Services at [[wikipedia:Valparaiso_University|Valparaiso University
column3: Indiana]]. He has written several works on librarianship. He is the editor of the'' [[Journal of Tolkien Research]]''
column4: an open access scientific electronic journal.
